label: 上御局
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Rooms that were] reserved for the use of Imperial consorts and concubines visiting the Seiryōden from their quarters elsewhere in the Dairi.  Situated in the northernmost part of the building, they provided convenient access to both the Women's Quarters and the Imperial Bedchamber (p. 844). [清涼殿、内裏] [Also read uetsubone]
